title: Asset Secondary Attribute Model
description: A set of attributes for Assets that can be added in an ad-hoc manner

name.description: This is the key of the secondary attribute used for lookup

value.description: The actual value of the secondary attributeas a JSON object

category.description: This is the optional category that the attribute may fit in e.g. from a particular system or of a particular type

dataType.description: This is the optional data type of the value which can be null or a reference to a model schema
